import{mergeStyles,getTheme}from'@fluentui/react';var headerShadow='rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.133) 0px 1.6px 3.6px 0px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.11) 0px 0.3px 0.9px 0px';var palette=getTheme().palette;export var pivotItemStyles={linkIsSelected:{padding:0,marginRight:0,height:'100%',color:palette.themePrimary,selectors:{':hover':{color:palette.themePrimary}}},link:{padding:0,marginRight:0,height:'3.75rem'},root:{width:'5.25rem',height:'3.75rem',display:'inline-block',verticalAlign:'top'}};export var pivotContainerStyle=mergeStyles({display:'inline-block'});export var headerContainer=mergeStyles({width:'100%',height:'3.875rem',padding:'0.0625rem 0',boxShadow:headerShadow,overflow:'hidden',flexDirection:'row',justifyContent:'flex-end',alignItems:'center',marginBottom:2});export var headerCenteredContainer=mergeStyles(headerContainer,{justifyContent:'center'});export var separatorContainerStyle=mergeStyles({display:'inline-block',padding:'0 1rem',height:'1.875rem'});export var pivotItemStyle=mergeStyles({padding:'0 0.8125rem'});export var separatorStyles={root:{color:palette.neutralLight,width:'0.0625rem'// 1px
}};
